Victoria noun
(GODDESS)
in Roman mythology (= ancient stories), the goddess (= female god) of victory: : Victoria's symbols are wings and laurel. Compare
Nike
More examplesFewer examplesVictoria is the Roman version of Nike, Greek mythology's goddess of victory.Victoria is recognized by her golden wings.This statue of Victoria, the Roman Goddess of Victory was sculpted by Ferdinand Edvard Ring.The ancient wing of a bronze sculpture found in Gloucester could have been part of a statuette of Victoria, the goddess of victory.
